languages.text:
Всегда имеет значение, с какой стороны атаковать вражеский корабль со {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g} — направляйте огонь туда, где щиты уже ослаблены или полностью сняты.
Обратите внимание: щиты противников восстанавливаются каждый ход.

When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.
languages.original_text:
Всегда имеет значение, с какой стороны атаковать вражеский корабль со {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g} — направляйте огонь туда, где щиты уже ослаблены или полностью сняты.
Обратите внимание: щиты противников восстанавливаются каждый ход.

traits.locale_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with shields, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or depleted completely.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

When facing an enemy ship equipped with shields, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or depleted completely.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

When facing an enemy ship equipped with shields, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

languages.text:
Al enfrentarte a una nave enemiga con {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g}, elige el ángulo de ataque con cabeza y dirige tus disparos contra los lados en los que los escudos del enemigo estén debilitados o agotados por completo.
Ten en cuenta que los escudos de los enemigos se recuperan cada asalto.
languages.original_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

traits.locale_text:
Al enfrentarte a una nave enemiga con escudos, elige el ángulo de ataque con cabeza y dirige tus disparos contra los lados en los que los escudos del enemigo estén debilitados o agotados por completo.
Ten en cuenta que los escudos de los enemigos se recuperan cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}を装備した敵艦と対峙する場合は、攻撃角度を賢く選択し、シールドが弱まっているか完全に消耗している側に向けて砲火を浴びせる。
なお、敵のシールドはラウンドごとに回復する。
languages.original_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

traits.locale_text:
シールドを装備した敵艦と対峙するときは、攻撃角度を賢く選択し、シールドが弱まっているか完全に消耗している側に向けて砲火を浴びせる。
なお、敵のシールドは{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに回復する。

languages.text:
攻击带有{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}的敌舰时，要明确地选择攻击角度，将所有火力集中在护盾受损或完全耗尽的那一侧。
注意，敌人的护盾每轮都会恢复。
languages.original_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

traits.locale_text:
攻击带有护盾的敌舰时，要明确地选择攻击角度，将所有火力集中在护盾受损或完全耗尽的那一侧。
注意，敌人的护盾每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会恢复。

languages.text:
Wenn du dich einem mit {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilden{/g} ausgerüsteten gegnerischen Schiff gegenübersiehst, wähle deinen Angriffswinkel weise und richte dein Feuer auf eine Seite, an der die Schilde geschwächt oder ganz aufgebraucht sind.
Beachte, dass sich die Schilde der Gegner jede Runde erholen.
languages.original_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn du dich einem mit Schilden ausgerüsteten gegnerischen Schiff gegenübersiehst, wähle deinen Angriffswinkel weise und richte dein Feuer auf eine Seite, an der die Schilde geschwächt oder ganz aufgebraucht sind.
Beachte, dass sich die Schilde der Gegner jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erholen.

languages.text:
Face à un vaisseau équipé de {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g}, choisissez judicieusement votre angle d'attaque et dirigez vos tirs vers un flanc où les boucliers sont affaiblis ou totalement épuisés.
Notez que les boucliers des ennemis se rétablissent à chaque round.
languages.original_text:
When facing an enemy ship equipped with {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, choose your angle of attack wisely and direct your fire at a side where the shields are weakened or completely depleted.
Note that enemies' shields recover each round.

traits.locale_text:
Face à un vaisseau équipé de boucliers, choisissez judicieusement votre angle d'attaque et dirigez vos tirs vers un flanc où les boucliers sont affaiblis ou totalement épuisés.
Notez que les boucliers des ennemis se rétablissent à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
